node.name: Dual Band Router MAKE: TP-LINK MODEL: Archer C20
node.description: Dual band router with maximum link speed of 750 Mbps and transferring speed not more than 450 Mbps. Ideal for offices and large houses with minimum subscription plan of greater than 75 Mbps. Economical option for teenagers who indulge in online gaming while not disturbing the speed for another user. (SIZE: 230x144x35mm / WEIGHT: 320 grams / FREQUENCY: 5.1 GHz)
node.content: TP-Link is from China and major player in networking hardware business / The benefits for dual band router is to make two different network, one with frequency 2.4 GHz which has link speed of 300Mbps and other is of 5.1 GHz which can provide link speed of 750 Mbps, and also in this way online game player can play their games without disturbing the overall speed of internet / This router is best suited for bigger network plans and can provide the transferring speed of 450 Mbps within the area of 2000 Sqft which is more than 4BHK home / Ability to cover 6 WiFi devices with optimum distribution speed and built-in software for range extender in case its purpose is to serve 4 storey building office.
node.alt: TP-Link AC750 Dual Band Wireless Cable Router 4 10 100 LAN  10 100 WAN Ports

node.name: VPN Wired Router MAKE: CISCO MODEL: RV160
node.description: Reliable, secure routing for business, easy to configure and deploy, offer low-touch remote deployment and consist dual-core processor that provides performance usually found only in more expensive solutions. It is a wired model with firewall and VPN security. (SIZE: 200x150x30mm / WEIGHT: 590 grams)
node.content: Cisco, an American IT and networking security provider came up with this RV160 wired model router which offers a high-performance experience at an affordable cost / Built-in standard features like firewall, VPN security, content filtering and device wizards to make an easy setup even easier / This is business router which comes with high-performance Gigabit Ethernet ports, enabling large file transfers and multiple users.
node.alt: Cisco RV160 VPN Router | Gigabit Ethernet (GbE) Wired Ports | Limited Lifetime Protection (RV160-K9-IN)

node.name: Single Band Router MAKE: TP-LINK MODEL: TL-WR841N
node.description: Single band router with maximum link speed of 300 Mbps and transferring speed not more than 54 Mbps(Note link speed & transferring speed are two different things). Ideal for 2 BHK home or area less than 1000 Sqft with not more than 4 connecting device. (SIZE: 175x116x33 mm / WEIGHT: 250 grams / FREQUENCY: 2.4 GHz)
node.content: With wireless type of 802.11 b/g this single band router has a maximum transferring speed of 54Mbps with a limited range ideal for house area less than 1000 Sqft / Even if user has a network plan of 100Mbps, this router cannot transfer the speed more than 54Mbps / This router can only provide the single network because of 2.4 GHz frequency and if some buyer expecting that he can make separate network for online gaming purpose than he or she must change their selection to dual band router / Four LAN distribution ports are given to connect the home desktop directly and access the maximum limit of data speed which is 54Mbps / According to network technicians single band routers are best for the 4 WiFi enabled devices on surfing mode and small scale downloading.
node.alt: TP-Link TL-WR841N 300Mbps Wireless N Cable, 4 Fast LAN

node.name: Multi Band Router MAKE: TENDA MODEL: AC10
node.description: Multi Band router or in easy terms can say addition 5GHz band width is provided along with one 2.4 GHz and second 5.1 GHz band width. With 4 antenna it can deliver the maximum link speed of 900 Mbps and downloading speed of 600 Mbps. This router is for multiple devices at single time and within 2500 Sqft of area. (SIZE: 220x140x49mm / WEIGHT: 350 grams / FREQUENCY: 5.1 GHz)
node.content: Built with MU-MIMO technology that allows multiple devices to get high-bandwidth WiFi signal at the same time, and also distributing data more efficiently while giving users the fastest WiFi speeds / 4 antenna and with 3 band width user can plug up to 10 devices while streaming the live video in all / This router can provide 3 different networks like "Home" of 2.1 GHz band width, "Office" of 5.1 GHz and "Play" of 5.1 GHz bandwidth while distributing the speed in more useable manner / For A/C current fluctuation there is a power cut circuit built inside so that router can be saved from rapid drop down.
node.alt: Tenda AC10 AC1200 Wireless Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router
